sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over intersection.
message_1: Let A={1, 2, 3, 4, 5} and B={3, 4, 5, 6, 7}. Find the symmetric difference of the sets A and B and then find the intersection of the result with the set {3, 4, 5}. Verify that the symmetric difference of sets A and B is distributive over the intersection of set {3, 4, 5}.
